channel.title: Git on Sam Merrell
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Sam Merrell

item.title: Shell Scripting and Git Fun
item.description: This afternoon I got the urge to whip up a quick script to help me when using git and a GitHub hosted repository. Quite often I want to look at the GitHub page of a project I’m working on when I’m sitting on the command line in the repository. So I figured, how could I go about making it easier to open that URL without having to find the link in Chrome or on GitHub’s site.
